actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that service performed by prevailing rate employees before conversion to wage schedules under the amendments made by the act of August 19, 1972, shall be counted for all step-increases under the time in step provisions of section 5343(e)(2) of title 5, United States Code, as amended by such act.

summary.text: Provides that service performed by prevailing rate employees of the Federal Government before conversion to wage schedules pursuant to Federal law shall be counted for all step-increases under the time in step provisions of Federal law.

titles.title: A bill to provide that service performed by prevailing rate employees before conversion to wage schedules under the amendments made by the act of August 19, 1972, shall be counted for all step-increases under the time in step provisions of section 5343(e)(2) of title 5, United States Code, as amended by such act.
